actionTemplate.title: Fix powdery, floating foundation
steps: Cleanse gently to remove excess oil and dead skin
Moisturize with fast-absorbing layers; avoid heavy cream
Apply primer to smooth and grip
Switch to a lighter, finer foundation formula
Set with very thin powder layers; press then sweep edges

rationaleTemplate: Balances skin so base can merge instead of sitting on top
Thin layers reduce clumping and patchy texture
